name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: [SOUND].

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: This lecture is about the future of web search.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _In this lecture
column6: we're going to talk about some possible future trends _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: of web search and intelligent information retrieval systems in general.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _In order to further improve the accuracy of a search engine

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: it's important that to consider special cases of information need.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: So one particular trend could be to have more and more specialized than

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _customized search engines
column6: and they can be called vertical search engines. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: These vertical search engines can be expected to be more effective than

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: the current general search engines because they could assume that

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _users are a special group of users that might have a common information need

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _and then the search engine can be customized with this ser
column6: so

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And because of the customization
column6: it's also possible to do personalization. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So the search can be personalized

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: because we have a better understanding of the users.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Because of the restrictions with domain
column6: we also have some advantages _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _in handling the documents
column6: because we can have better understanding of documents. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _For example
column6: particular words may not be ambiguous in such a domain. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: So we can bypass the problem of ambiguity.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Another trend we can expect to see

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: is the search engine will be able to learn over time.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _It's like a lifetime learning or lifelong learning
column6: and this is

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: very attractive because that means the search engine will self-improve itself.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _As more people are using it
column6: the search engine will become better and better

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _this is already happening

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: because the search engines can learn from the [INAUDIBLE] of feedback.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _More users use it
column6: and the quality of the search engine allows for _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _the popular queries that are typed in by many users allow it to become better

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: so this is sort of another feature that we will see.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: The third trend might be to the integration of

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: bottles of information access.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So search
column6: navigation
column7: and recommendation or filtering might be _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: combined to form a full-fledged information management system.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And in the beginning of this course
column6: we talked about push versus pull. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _These are different modes of information access
column6: but these modes can be combined. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And similarly
column6: in the pull mode
column7: querying and the browsing could also be combined. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And in fact we're doing that basically
column6: today

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _We are querying
column6: sometimes browsing

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: Sometimes we've got some information recommended.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: Although most of the cases the information recommended is because of advertising.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _But in the future
column6: you can imagine seamlessly integrate the system with _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _multi-mode for information access
column6: and that would be convenient for people. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: Another trend is that we might see systems

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: that try to go beyond the searches to support the user tasks.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _After all
column6: the reason why people want to search is to solve a problem or _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: to make a decision or perform a task.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: For example consumers might search for

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _opinions about products in order to purchase a product

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _choose a good product by
column6: so in this case it would be beneficial to _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _support the whole workflow of purchasing a product
column6: or choosing a product. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _In this era
column6: after the common search engines already provide a good support. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _For example
column6: you can sometimes look at the reviews
column7: and then if you want to buy it

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: you can just click on the button to go the shopping site and directly get it done.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _But it does not provide a
column6: a good task support for many other tasks. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _For example
column6: for researchers

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: you might want to find the realm in the literature or site of the literature.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And then
column6: there's no
column7: not much support for finishing a task such as writing a paper. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So
column6: in general
column8: there are many opportunities in the wait. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So in the following few slides
column6: I'll be talking a little bit more about some _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _specific ideas or thoughts that hopefully

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: can help you in imagining new application possibilities.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: Some of them might be already relevant to what you are currently working on.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _In general
column6: we can think about any intelligent system

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _information system
column6: as we specified by these these three nodes. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And so if we connect these three into a triangle

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: then we'll able to specify an information system.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: And I call this Data-User-Service Triangle.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: So basically the three questions you ask would be who are you serving and

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: what kind of data are you are managing and what kind of service you provide.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Right there
column6: this would help us basically specify in your system. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: And there are many different ways to connect them depending on

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _how you connect them
column6: you will have a different kind of systems. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: So let me give you some examples.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _On the top
column6: you can see different kinds of users. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _On the left side
column6: you can see different types of data or information

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _on the bottom
column6: you can see different service functions. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: Now imagine you can connect all these in different ways.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So
column6: for example
column7: you can connect everyone with web pages

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _the support search and browsing
column6: what do you get? _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Well
column6: that's web search

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: What if we connect UIUC employees with organization documents or enterprise

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _documents to support the search and browsing
column6: but that's enterprise search. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: If you connect the scientist with literature information

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _to provide all kinds of service
column6: including search

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _alert of new random documents or mining analyzing research trends

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: or provide the task with support or decision support.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _For example
column6: we might be
column7: might be able to provide a support for _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: automatically generating related work section for

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _a research paper
column6: and this would be closer to task support. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: Right? So then

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: we can imagine this would be a literature assistant.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: If we connect the online shoppers with blog articles or product reviews

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: then we can help these people to improve shopping experience.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So we can provide
column6: for example data mining capabilities to analyze the reviews

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _to compare products
column6: compare sentiment of products and to provide task support or _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: decision support to have them choose what product to buy.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Or we can connect customer service people with emails from the customers

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _and
column6: and we can imagine a system that can provide a analysis _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: of these emails to find that the major complaints of the customers.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: We can imagine a system we could provide task support

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: by automatically generating a response to a customer email.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: Maybe intelligently attach also a promotion message

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _if appropriate
column6: if they detect that that's a positive message

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: then you might take this opportunity to attach some promotion information.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Whereas if it's a complaint
column6: then you might be able to _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: automatically generate some generic response first and

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _tell the customer that he or she can expect a detailed response later
column6: etc. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: All of these are trying to help people to improve the productivity.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: So this shows that the opportunities are really a lot.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: It's just only restricted by our imagination.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So this picture shows the trend of the technology
column6: and also

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _it characterizes the
column6: intelligent information system in three angles. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _You can see in the center
column6: there's a triangle that connects keyword queries _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: to search a bag of words representation.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: That means the current search engines basically provides search support

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: to users and mostly model users based on keyword queries

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: and sees the data through bag of words representation.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: So it's a very simple approximation of the actual information in the documents.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: But that's what the current system does.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _It connects these three nodes in such a simple way
column6: or _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _it only provides a basic search function and doesn't really understand the user

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: and it doesn't really understand that much information in the documents.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Now
column6: I showed some trends to push each node toward a more advanced function. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So think about the user node here
column6: right? _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So we can go beyond the keyword queries
column6: look at the user search history

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _and then further model the user completely to understand the

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _the user's task environment
column6: task need context or other information. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Okay
column6: so this is pushing for personalization and complete user model. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And this is a major direction in research in

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: in order to build intelligent information systems.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _On the document side
column6: we can also see

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: go beyond bag of words implementation to have entity relation representation.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _This means we'll recognize people's names
column6: their relations

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: And this is already feasible with today's natural processing technique.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: And Google is the reason the initiative on the knowledge graph.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _If you haven't heard of it
column6: it is a good step toward this direction. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And once we can get to that level without initiating robust manner at larger scale

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: it can enable the search engine to provide a much better service.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: In the future we would like to have

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _knowledge representation where we can add perhaps inference rules
column6: and _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: then the search engine would become more intelligent.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So this calls for large-scale semantic analysis
column6: and _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: perhaps this is more feasible for vertical search engines.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: It's easier to make progress in the particular domain.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Now on the service side

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: we see we need to go beyond the search of support information access in general.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: So search is only one way to get access to information as well recommender

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: systems and push and pull so different ways to get access to random information.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _But going beyond access

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _we also need to help people digest the information once the information is found

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: and this step has to do with analysis of information or data mining.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: We have to find patterns or convert the text information into

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: real knowledge that can be used in application or

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: actionable knowledge that can be used for decision making.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: And furthermore the knowledge will be used to help a user to

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _improve productivity in finishing a task
column6: for example

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Right
column6: so this is a trend. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And
column6: and

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: in the future intelligent information systems will provide intelligent and

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: interactive task support.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _Now I should also emphasize interactive here
column6: because it's important to optimize _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: the combined intelligence of the users and the system.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So we
column6: we can get some help from users in some natural way. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _And we don't have to assume the system has to do everything when the human

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _user
column6: and the machine can collaborate in an intelligent way

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _then the combined intelligence will be high and in general

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: we can minimize the user's overall effort in solving problem.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: _So this is the big picture of future intelligent information systems

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: and this hopefully can provide us with some insights about

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: how to make further innovations on top of what we handled today.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.5 Future of Web Search (00-13-09).srt
text: [MUSIC]
